YOSUA 13

JOSHUA 13

 

 

III. Membagikan Tanah Permai dengan Undi

III. Allotting the good land

13:1-22:34

13:1-22:34

A. Tanah yang Belum Direbut

A. The land remaining to be possessed

13:1-7

13:1-7

 

 

13:1 Setelah Yosua menjadi atua dan lanjut umurnya, berfirmanlah Tuhan kepadanya: Engkau telah tua dan lanjut umur, dan dari negeri ini masih amat banyak yang belum diduduki.

13:1 Now Joshua was a old and advanced in age; and Jehovah said to him, You are old and advanced in age, and very much of the land remains to be possessed.

13:2 Inilah negeri yang tertinggal: segenap wilayah orang Filistin dan seluruh negeri orang Gesur,

13:2 This is the land that remains: all the regions of the Philistines and all that of the Geshurites,

13:3 mulai dari sungai Sikhor di sebelah timur Mesir sampai ke daerah Ekron ke arah utara - semuanya itu terhitung tanah orang Kanaan -; ada alima raja kota orang Filistin, yakni di Gaza, di Asdod, di Askelon, di Gat dan di Ekron -; dan orang Awi

13:3 From the Shihor, which is before Egypt, unto the border of Ekron on the north (this is considered to be Canaanite), with a five lords of the Philistines: the Gazite and the Ashdodite, the Ashkelonite, the Gittite, and the Ekronite; and that of the Avvim

13:4 di sebelah selatan; seluruh negeri orang Kanaan dan Meara, kepunyaan orang Sidon, sampai ke Afek, sampai ke daerah orang aAmori;

13:4 In the south; all the land of the Canaanites, and Mearah, which belongs to the Sidonians, unto Aphek at the border of the a Amorites;

13:5 selanjutnya negeri orang Gebal dan seluruh gunung Libanon di sebelah matahari terbit, mulai dari Baal-Gad di kaki gunung Hermon sampai ke jalan yang menuju ke aHamat;

13:5 And the land of the Gebalites and all Lebanon toward the rising of the sun, from Baal-gad under Mount Hermon to the entrance of a Hamath;

13:6 semua orang yang diam di pegunungan, mulai dari gunung Libanon sampai ke Misrefot-Maim; semua orang Sidon. Aku sendiri akan amenghalau mereka dari depan orang Israel; hanya 1bundikanlah dahulu negeri itu di antara orang Israel menjadi milik pusaka mereka, seperti yang Kuperintahkan kepadamu.

13:6 All the inhabitants of the hill country from Lebanon to Misrephoth-maim, all the Sidonians. I Myself will a drive them out before the children of Israel; nevertheless 1b allot it to Israel as an inheritance as I have commanded you.

13:7 Oleh sebab itu, 1bagikanlah negeri ini kepada suku yang asembilan itu dan kepada suku Manasye yang setengah itu menjadi milik pusaka mereka.

13:7 And now 1 divide this land as an inheritance to the a nine tribes and the half-tribe of Manasseh.

 

 

B. Tanah Sebelah Timur Yordan Dibagikan kepada Dua Setengah Suku oleh Musa

B. The land east of the Jordan allotted to the two and a half tribes by Moses

13:8-14:3a

13:8-14:3a

 

 

13:8 Bersama-sama dengan 1suku Manasye yang setengah lagi, orang aRuben dan orang Gad telah menerima milik pusaka mereka, yang telah diberikan Musa kepada mereka di sebelah timur sungai Yordan, seperti yang ditentukan Musa, hamba Tuhan itu, kepada mereka,

13:8 With 1 the other half-tribe of Manasseh the a Reubenites and the Gadites received their inheritance, which Moses gave to them across the Jordan on the east, as Moses the servant of Jehovah gave to them:

13:9 yakni mulai dari aAroer, yang di tepi sungai Arnon, kota pada pertengahan sungai itu, dan seluruh dataran tinggi, dari Medeba sampai ke Dibon;

13:9 From a Aroer, which is on the edge of the river Arnon, and from the city, which is in the middle of the river valley, and all the tableland from Medeba to Dibon;

13:10 dan segala kota Sihon, raja orang Amori, yang berkerajaan di Hesybon, sampai ke daerah orang Amon;

13:10 And all the cities of Sihon the king of the Amorites, who reigned in Heshbon, unto the border of the children of Ammon;

13:11 selanjutnya Gilead dan daerah orang Gesur dan orang Maakha, serta seluruh gunung Hermon dan seluruh tanah Basan sampai ke Salkha,

13:11 And Gilead with the territory of the Geshurites and the Maacathites, and all Mount Hermon and all Bashan unto Salecah;

13:12 seluruh kerajaan Og di Basan, yang memerintah di Asytarot dan Edrei, dialah yang tinggal hidup dari sisa-sisa orang Refaim yang telah adikalahkan dan dihalau oleh Musa.

13:12 All the kingdom of Og in Bashan, who reigned in Ashtaroth and in Edrei (he was left of the remnant of the Rephaim); and Moses a struck them and dispossessed them.

13:13 Tetapi orang Israel tidak menghalau orang Gesur dan orang Maakha itu, sehingga Gesur dan Maakha masih tetap diam di tengah-tengah Israel sampai sekarang.

13:13 Yet the children of Israel did not dispossess the Geshurites and the Maacathites, but Geshur and Maacath dwell in the midst of Israel to this day.

13:14 Hanya kepada suku Lewi tidak diberikan amilik pusaka: yang menjadi 1milik pusakanya ialah Tuhan, Allah Israel, seperti yang dijanjikan-Nya kepada mereka.

13:14 However to the tribe of Levi he did not give an a inheritance; the 1 offerings of Jehovah the God of Israel by fire are their inheritance, as He had spoken to him.

13:15 Kepada suku bani Ruben, menurut kaum-kaum mereka, telah diberikan Musa bagian ini:

13:15 And Moses gave an inheritance to the tribe of the children of Reuben according to their families.

13:16 daerah kepunyaan mereka mulai dari aAroer yang di tepi sungai Arnon, kota pada pertengahan sungai itu, dan seluruh dataran tinggi dekat Medeba;

13:16 And for them the border was from a Aroer, which is on the edge of the river Arnon, and from the city, which is in the middle of the river valley, and all the tableland by Medeba;

13:17 Hesybon dan segala kotanya, yang di dataran tinggi, yakni Dibon, Bamot-Baal, Bet-Baal-Meon,

13:17 Heshbon and all its cities which are in the tableland: Dibon and Bamoth-baal and Beth-baal-meon

13:18 Yahas, Kedemot, Mefaat,

13:18 And Jahaz and Kedemoth and Mephaath

13:19 Kiryataim, Sibma, Zeret-Hasahar di atas gunung di lembah itu,

13:19 And Kiriathaim and Sibmah and Zereth-shahar on the mountain of the valley

13:20 Bet-Peor, lereng-lereng gunung Pisga, Bet-Yesimot,

13:20 And Beth-peor and the slopes of Pisgah and Beth-jeshimoth;

13:21 selanjutnya segala kota di dataran tinggi itu dan seluruh kerajaan Sihon, raja orang Amori, yang memerintah di Hesybon, yang adikalahkan oleh Musa; bersama-sama dia juga dikalahkannya raja-raja Midian, yakni Ewi, Rekem, Zur, Hur dan Reba, raja-raja bawahan Sihon, penduduk negeri itu.

13:21 That is, all the cities of the tableland and all the kingdom of Sihon the king of the Amorites, who reigned in Heshbon and whom Moses a struck with the leaders of Midian: Evi and Rekem and Zur and Hur and Reba, the princes of Sihon who inhabited the land.

13:22 Juga Bileam bin Beor, juru tenung itu, telah dibunuh oleh orang Israel dengan pedang, beserta orang-orang yang telah mati tertikam oleh mereka.

13:22 And Balaam the son of Beor, who practiced divination, the children of Israel slew with the sword with those of them who were already slain.

13:23 Jadi batas daerah bani Ruben ialah sungai Yordan dengan daerah pinggirnya. Itulah milik pusaka bani Ruben menurut kaum-kaum mereka, yakni kota-kota dengan desa-desanya.

13:23 And the border of the children of Reuben was the Jordan and its border. This is the inheritance of the children of Reuben according to their families, the cities with their villages.

13:24 Kepada suku Gad, yakni kepada bani Gad menurut kaum-kaum mereka, telah diberikan Musa bagian ini:

13:24 And Moses gave an inheritance to the tribe of Gad, to the children of Gad, according to their families.

13:25 daerah kepunyaan mereka ialah Yaezer dan segala kota negeri Gilead, serta setengah negeri orang Amon sampai ke Aroer, yang di sebelah timur Raba,

13:25 And for them the border was Jazer and all the cities of Gilead, and half the land of the children of Ammon to Aroer, which is before Rabbah;

13:26 yakni mulai dari Hesybon sampai ke Ramat-Mizpa dan Betonim, dan dari aMahanaim sampai ke daerah Debir;

13:26 And from Heshbon to Ramath-mizpeh and Betonim; and from a Mahanaim to the border of Debir;

13:27 dan di lembah: Bet-Haram, Bet-Nimra, Sukot dan Zafon, sisa kerajaan Sihon, raja Hesybon; sungai Yordan dengan daerah pinggirnya, sampai ke ujung danau Kineret, di sebelah timur sungai Yordan.

13:27 And in the valley Beth-haram and Beth-nimrah and Succoth and Zaphon, the rest of the kingdom of Sihon the king of Heshbon; the Jordan and its border to the end of the Sea of Chinnereth, across the Jordan on the east.

13:28 Itulah milik pusaka bani Gad menurut kaum-kaum mereka, yakni kota-kota dengan desa-desanya.

13:28 This is the inheritance of the children of Gad according to their families, the cities with their villages.

13:29 Kepada suku Manasye yang setengah itu, yakni kepada puak bani Manasye yang setengah itu, menurut kaum-kaum mereka, telah diberikan Musa bagian ini:

13:29 And Moses gave an inheritance to the half-tribe of Manasseh; and it was for the half-tribe of the children of Manasseh according to their families.

13:30 daerah mereka mulai dari Mahanaim: seluruh Basan, seluruh kerajaan Og, raja Basan, dan segenap 1aHawot-Yair, yang di Basan itu, enam puluh kota banyaknya;

13:30 And their border was from Mahanaim and all Bashan, all the kingdom of Og the king of Bashan, and all the 1a tent villages of Jair, which are in Bashan, sixty cities;

13:31 selanjutnya setengah Gilead, Asytarot dan Edrei, kota-kota kerajaan Og di Basan, menjadi bagian bani Makhir, anak Manasye, yaitu bagian setengah bani Makhir menurut kaum-kaum mereka.

13:31 And half of Gilead, and Ashtaroth and Edrei, cities of the kingdom of Og in Bashan, were for the children of Machir the son of Manasseh, for half of the children of Machir, according to their families.

13:32 Itulah semuanya yang dibagikan Musa sebagai milik pusaka di dataran Moab di sebelah timur sungai Yordan dekat Yerikho.

13:32 These are what Moses gave as inheritances in the plains of Moab across the Jordan at Jericho to the east.

13:33 Tetapi kepada suku Lewi Musa tidak memberikan amilik pusaka: 1Tuhan, Allah Israel, Dialah yang menjadi milik pusaka mereka, seperti yang dijanjikan-Nya kepada mereka.

13:33 But to the tribe of Levi Moses did not give an a inheritance; 1 Jehovah the God of Israel is their inheritance, as He had spoken to them.

 

 

YOSUA 14

JOSHUA 14

 

 

14:1 Inilah semuanya yang diterima oleh orang Israel sebagai amilik pusaka di tanah Kanaan, yang telah dibagikan kepada orang Israel oleh imam bEleazar, dan Yosua bin Nun dan para kepala kaum keluarga dari suku-suku mereka,

14:1 And these are what the children of Israel received as a inheritances in the land of Canaan, which b Eleazar the priest and Joshua the son of Nun and the heads of the fathers houses of the tribes of the children of Israel gave to them as inheritances,

14:2 dengan 1amengundi milik pusaka itu, seperti yang diperintahkan Tuhan dengan perantaraan Musa mengenai suku-suku yang sembilan setengah itu.

14:2 By the 1a lot of their inheritance, as Jehovah commanded through Moses for the nine tribes and the half-tribe.

14:3a Sebab kepada asuku-suku yang dua setengah lagi telah diberikan Musa milik pusaka di seberang sungai Yordan,

14:3a For Moses had given the inheritance of the a two tribes and the half-tribe across the Jordan;

 

 

C. Suku Lewi Tidak Diberi Tanah

C. No land allotted to the tribe of Levi

14:3b-5

14:3b-5

 

 

14:3b tetapi kepada borang Lewi tidak diberikannya milik pusaka di tengah-tengah mereka.

14:3b but to the b Levites he did not give an inheritance among them.

14:4 Sebab bani Yusuf merupakan dua suku, Manasye dan Efraim. Maka kepada orang Lewi tidak diberikan bagiannya di negeri itu, selain dari akota-kota untuk didiami, dengan tanah penggembalaannya untuk ternak dan hewan mereka.

14:4 For the children of Joseph were two tribes, Manasseh and Ephraim; and they gave no portion to the Levites in the land, but only a cities to dwell in with their pasture lands for their cattle and their substance.

14:5 Seperti yang diperintahkan Tuhan kepada Musa, demikianlah diperbuat oleh orang Israel dan dibagi-bagi merekalah negeri itu.

14:5 As Jehovah had commanded Moses, so the children of Israel did; thus they divided the land.

 

 

 

 

D. Tanah yang Menjadi Bagian Suku Yehuda

D. The land allotted to the tribe of Judah

14:6-15:63

14:6-15:63

 

 

14:6 Bani Yehuda datang menghadap Yosua di Gilgal. Pada waktu itu berkatalah aKaleb bin Yefune, orang Kenas itu, kepadanya: Engkau tahu bfirman yang diucapkan Tuhan kepada Musa, abdi Allah itu, tentang aku dan tentang engkau di Kadesh-Barnea.

14:6 Then the children of Judah approached Joshua in Gilgal; and a Caleb the son of Jephunneh the Kenizzite said to him, You know the b word that Jehovah spoke to Moses the man of God concerning me and concerning you in Kadesh-barnea.

14:7 Aku berumur empat puluh tahun, ketika aku disuruh Musa, hamba Tuhan itu, dari Kadesh-Barnea untuk mengintai negeri ini; dan aku apulang membawa kabar kepadanya yang sejujur-jujurnya.

14:7 I was forty years old when Moses the servant of Jehovah sent me out from Kadesh-barnea to spy out the land; and I a returned such a word to him as was genuinely upon my heart.

14:8 Sedang saudara-saudaraku, yang bersama-sama pergi ke sana dengan aku, membuat atawar hati bangsa itu, aku tetap bmengikuti Tuhan, Allahku, dengan sepenuh hati.

14:8 However my brothers who went up with me made the peoples heart a melt, but I fully b followed Jehovah my God.

14:9 Pada waktu itu Musa bersumpah, katanya: Sesungguhnya tanah yang adiinjak oleh kakimu itu akan menjadi milik pusakamu dan anak-anakmu sampai selama-lamanya, sebab engkau tetap mengikuti Tuhan, Allahku, dengan sepenuh hati.

14:9 And Moses swore on that day, saying, Surely the land on which your foot has a trodden will be an inheritance to you and to your children forever, for you have fully followed Jehovah my God.

14:10 Jadi sekarang, sesungguhnya Tuhan telah memelihara hidupku, seperti yang dijanjikan-Nya. Kini sudah empat puluh lima tahun lamanya, sejak diucapkan Tuhan firman itu kepada Musa, dan selama itu orang Israel mengembara di padang gurun. Jadi sekarang, telah berumur delapan puluh lima tahun aku hari ini;

14:10 And now, look, Jehovah has kept me alive, as He said, for these forty-five years, since the time Jehovah spoke this word to Moses while Israel walked through the wilderness. And now, look, today I am eighty-five years old.

14:11 pada waktu ini aku masih sama akuat seperti pada waktu aku disuruh Musa; seperti kekuatanku pada waktu itu demikianlah kekuatanku sekarang untuk berperang dan untuk keluar masuk.

14:11 Today I am still as a strong as I was on the day Moses sent me out; as my strength was then, so my strength is now, for battle and for going out and coming in.

 

 

14:12 Oleh sebab itu, berikanlah kepadaku pegunungan, yang dijanjikan Tuhan pada waktu itu, sebab engkau sendiri mendengar pada waktu itu, bahwa di sana ada 1aorang Enak dengan kota-kota yang besar dan berkubu. Mungkin Tuhan menyertai aku, sehingga aku menghalau mereka, seperti yang difirmankan Tuhan.

14:12 Now therefore give me this hill country, of which Jehovah spoke on that day, for you heard on that day that the 1a Anakim were there with great fortified cities. It may be that Jehovah will be with me, and I will dispossess them, as Jehovah said.

14:13 Lalu Yosua memberkati Kaleb bin Yefune, dan diberikannyalah 1aHebron kepadanya menjadi milik pusakanya.

14:13 So Joshua blessed him; and he gave 1a Hebron to Caleb the son of Jephunneh as an inheritance.

14:14 Itulah sebabnya Hebron menjadi milik pusaka Kaleb bin Yefune, orang Kenas itu, sampai sekarang ini, karena ia tetap mengikuti Tuhan, Allah Israel, dengan sepenuh hati.

14:14 Therefore Hebron has become the inheritance of Caleb the son of Jephunneh the Kenizzite to this day because he fully followed Jehovah the God of Israel.

14:15 Nama Hebron dahulu ialah Kiryat-Arba; Arba ialah orang yang paling besar di antara orang Enak. Dan amanlah negeri itu, berhenti berperang.

14:15 And the name of Hebron was formerly Kiriath-arba. (This Arba was the greatest man among the Anakim.) And the land had rest from war.

 

 

YOSUA 15

JOSHUA 15

 

 

15:1 aBagian yang diundikan kepada suku bani Yehuda menurut kaum-kaum mereka adalah sampai ke batas tanah Edom, sampai ke padang gurun Zin ke selatan, di ujung selatan.

15:1 a And the lot for the tribe of the children of Judah according to their families was unto the border of Edom, to the wilderness of Zin at the south; this was the southern extreme.

15:2 Batas selatan bagi mereka mulai dari ujung Laut Asin, dari teluk yang menghadap ke selatan;

15:2 And their southern border was from the end of the Salt Sea, from the tongue-shaped bay that faces south;

15:3 lalu keluar pada sebelah selatan pendakian Akrabim, terus ke Zin, naik ke sebelah selatan Kadesh-Barnea, terus ke Hezron, naik ke Adar, membelok ke Karka,

15:3 And it went southward to the ascent of Akrabbim, and passed on to Zin, and went up south of Kadesh-barnea, and passed on to Hezron, and went up to Addar, and went around Karka,

15:4 terus ke Azmon dan keluar pada sungai tanah Mesir, sehingga batas itu berakhir ke laut. Itulah bagi kamu batas selatan.

15:4 And passed on to Azmon, and went out to the brook of Egypt; and the end of the border was at the sea. This shall be your southern border.

15:5 Batas timur ialah Laut Asin sampai ke muara sungai Yordan. aBatas pada sisi utara mulai dari teluk di muara sungai Yordan itu:

15:5 And the eastern border was the Salt Sea to the end of the Jordan. And the a border on the northern side was from the bay of the sea at the end of the Jordan.

15:6 batas itu naik ke Bet-Hogla, melalui sebelah utara Bet-Araba, kemudian batas itu naik ke batu Bohan bin Ruben;

15:6 And the border went up to Beth-hoglah, and passed on to the north of Beth-arabah; and the border went up to the stone of Bohan the son of Reuben;

15:7 lalu dari lembah Akhor batas itu naik ke Debir, dan menuju ke utara ke Gilgal di seberang pendakian Adumim, yang di sebelah selatan sungai. Kemudian batas itu terus ke mata air En-Semes dan keluar ke En-Rogel.

15:7 And the border went up to Debir from the Valley of Achor, and turned northward toward Gilgal, which is opposite the ascent of Adummim, which is south of the river valley; and the border passed on to the waters of En-shemesh; and its end was at En-rogel;

15:8 Kemudian batas itu naik ke 1lembah Ben-Hinom, di sebelah selatan sepanjang lereng gunung aYebus, itulah Yerusalem; kemudian batas itu naik ke puncak gunung yang di seberang lembah Hinom, di sebelah barat, di ujung utara lembah orang Refaim.

15:8 Then the border went up by the 1 Valley of Ben-hinnom to the south of the a Jebusite slope (this is Jerusalem); and the border went to the top of the mountain that is before the Valley of Hinnom on the west, which is the northern end of the Valley of Rephaim;

15:9 Kemudian batas itu melengkung dari puncak gunung itu ke mata air Me-Neftoah, lalu keluar ke kota-kota pegunungan Efron; selanjutnya batas itu melengkung ke Baala, itulah Kiryat-Yearim.

15:9 And the border turned from the top of the mountain to the spring of the waters of Nephtoah and went to the cities of Mount Ephron; then the border turned toward Baalah (this is Kiriath-jearim);

15:10 Kemudian batas itu membelok dari Baala ke barat ke pegunungan Seir, terus ke utara ke lereng gunung Yearim, itulah Kesalon, turun ke aBet-Semes dan terus ke bTimna.

15:10 And the border went around west of Baalah to Mount Seir, and passed by the northern slope of Mount Jearim (this is Chesalon), and went down to a Beth-shemesh, and passed on to b Timnah;

15:11 Kemudian batas itu keluar ke utara ke lereng gunung aEkron; kemudian batas itu melengkung ke Sikron, terus ke gunung Baala dan keluar dekat Yabneel, sehingga batas itu berakhir di laut.

15:11 And the border went to the slope of a Ekron northward; and the border turned toward Shikkeron, and passed by Mount Baalah, and went to Jabneel; and the end of the border was at the sea.

15:12 Batas barat ialah Laut Besar dan pantainya. Itulah, ke segala penjuru, batas-batas daerah bani Yehuda menurut kaum-kaum mereka.

15:12 And the western border was the Great Sea and its coast. This is the border of the children of Judah all around according to their families.

15:13 Tetapi kepada aKaleb bin Yefune diberikan Yosua sebagian di tengah-tengah bani Yehuda itu, yakni Kiryat-Arba, seperti yang dititahkan Tuhan kepadanya; Arba ialah bapa 1Enak. Itulah Hebron.

15:13 And to a Caleb the son of Jephunneh he gave a portion in the midst of the children of Judah according to the commandment of Jehovah to Joshua, that is, Kiriath-arba (Arba was the father of 1 Anak); this is Hebron.

15:14 Dan Kaleb menghalau dari sana ketiga orang aEnak, yakni Sesai, Ahiman dan Talmai, anak-anak Enak.

15:14 And Caleb drove out the three sons of a Anak from there: Sheshai and Ahiman and Talmai, the children of Anak.

15:15 aDari sana ia maju menyerang penduduk Debir. Nama Debir itu dahulu ialah Kiryat-Sefer.

15:15 a And he went up from there to the inhabitants of Debir. (Now the name of Debir was formerly Kiriath-sepher.)

15:16 Lalu berkatalah Kaleb: Siapa yang menggempur Kiryat-Sefer dan merebutnya, kepadanya akan kuberikan Akhsa, anakku, menjadi isterinya.

15:16 And Caleb said, Whoever strikes Kiriath-sepher and takes it, I will give to him Achsah my daughter as wife.

15:17 Dan aOtniel, anak Kenas saudara Kaleb, merebut kota itu; lalu Kaleb memberikan kepadanya Akhsa, anaknya, menjadi isterinya.

15:17 Then a Othniel the son of Kenaz, Calebs brother, took it; and he gave him Achsah his daughter as wife.

15:18 Ketika perempuan itu tiba, dibujuknya suaminya untuk meminta ladang kepada ayahnya. Maka turunlah perempuan itu dari keledainya, lalu berkatalah Kaleb kepadanya: Ada apa?

15:18 And when she came to him, she urged him to ask her father for a field. And she alighted from her donkey, and Caleb said to her, What do you want?

15:19 Jawabnya: Berikanlah kepadaku hadiah; telah kauberikan kepadaku tanah yang gersang, berikanlah juga kepadaku mata air. Lalu diberikannyalah kepadanya mata air yang di hulu dan mata air yang di hilir.

15:19 And she said, Give me a blessing, for you have given me land in the Negev; give me also springs of water. So he gave her the upper springs and the lower springs.

15:20 Inilah milik pusaka suku bani Yehuda menurut kaum-kaum mereka.

15:20 This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Judah according to their families.

15:21 Kota-kota suku bani Yehuda yang paling ujung, dekat batas tanah Edom di Tanah Negeb, ialah Kabzeel, Eder, Yagur,

15:22 Kina, Dimona, Adada,

15:26 Amam and Shema and Moladah

15:29 Baalah and Iim and Ezem

15:30 And Eltolad and Chesil and Hormah

15:31 And a Ziklag and Madmannah and Sansannah

15:32 Lebaot, Silhim, Ain dan Rimon; seluruhnya dua puluh sembilan kota dengan desa-desanya.

15:32 And Lebaoth and Shilhim and Ain and Rimmon: in all twenty-nine cities with their villages.

15:33 Di Daerah Bukit: aEsytaol, Zora, Asna,

15:33 In the lowland: a Eshtaol and Zorah and Ashnah

15:36 And Shaaraim and Adithaim and Gederah and Gederothaim: fourteen cities with their villages.

15:41 And Gederoth; Beth-dagon and Naamah and Makkedah: sixteen cities with their villages.

15:47 Asdod dengan segala anak kota dan desa-desanya, Gaza dengan segala anak kota dan desa-desanya, sampai ke sungai tanah Mesir, Laut Besar dan pantainya.

15:60 Kiriath-baal (this is Kiriath-jearim) and Rabbah: two cities with their villages.

15:61 In the wilderness: Beth-arabah, Middin, and Secacah;

15:62 Nibsan, Kota Garam dan aEn-Gedi; enam kota dengan desa-desanya.

15:62 And Nibshan and the City of Salt and a En-gedi: six cities with their villages.

15:63 Tetapi aorang Yebus, penduduk kota Yerusalem, tidak dapat bdihalau oleh bani Yehuda. Jadi orang Yebus itu masih tetap diam bersama-sama dengan bani Yehuda di Yerusalem sampai sekarang.

15:63 But as for the a Jebusites, the inhabitants of Jerusalem, the children of Judah could not b dispossess them; thus the Jebusites dwell with the children of Judah in Jerusalem to this day.

 

 

YOSUA 16

JOSHUA 16

 

 

E. Tanah yang Menjadi Bagian Suku Yusuf

E. The land allotted to the tribe of Joseph

16:1-17:18

16:1-17:18

1. Dari Yerikho Sampai Betel dan ke Laut

1. From Jericho to Bethel and to the sea

16:1-4

16:1-4

 

 

16:1 Kemudian keluarlah undian bagi bani Yusuf. Batas mereka mulai adari sungai Yordan dekat bYerikho, di sebelah timur mata-mata air Yerikho, melalui padang gurun, yang naik dari Yerikho ke pegunungan, ke Betel,

16:1 And the lot for the children of Joseph went a from the Jordan at b Jericho, east of the waters of Jericho, to the wilderness, going up from Jericho into the hill country to Bethel,

16:2 keluar dari aBetel menuju ke Lus, terus ke daerah orang Arki, ke Atarot,

16:2 And went from a Bethel to Luz, and passed on to the border of the Archites at Ataroth,

16:3 turun ke barat ke daerah orang Yaflet, sampai daerah Bet-Horon Hilir dan selanjutnya sampai Gezer dan berakhir di laut.

16:3 And went down westward to the border of the Japhletites, to the border of Lower Beth-horon and to Gezer; and its end was the sea.

16:4 Demikianlah bani Yusuf, yakni suku Manasye dan suku Efraim, menerima milik pusaka.

16:4 And the children of Joseph, Manasseh and Ephraim, received their inheritance.

 

 

2. Tanah yang Menjadi Bagian Keturunan Efraim, Putra Kedua Yusuf

2. The land allotted to the children of Ephraim, the second son of Joseph

16:5-10

16:5-10

 

 

16:5 Daerah bani Efraim menurut kaum-kaum mereka ialah demikian: batas milik pusaka mereka ke timur ialah Atarot-Adar sampai Bet-Horon Hulu.

16:5 And the border of the children of Ephraim according to their families was thus: The border for their inheritance on the east was from Ataroth-addar to Upper Beth-horon;

16:6 Ke barat batas itu keluar adi sebelah utara Mikhmetat; kemudian batas itu membelok ke timur ke Taanat-Silo, dan dari sana terus sampai ke sebelah timur Yanoah,

16:6 And the border went to the sea. a On the north was Michmethath, and the border went around eastward to Taanath-shiloh, and passed by it to the east of Janoah,

16:7 turun dari Yanoah ke Atarot dan Naharat, menyinggung daerah Yerikho dan keluar ke sungai Yordan.

16:7 And went down from Janoah to Ataroth, then to Naarah, and reached Jericho, and went to the Jordan.

16:8 Dari Tapuah batas itu terus ke barat ke sungai Kana dan berakhir ke laut. Itulah milik pusaka suku bani Efraim menurut kaum-kaum mereka.

16:8 From Tappuah the border went westward to the brook of Kanah; and its end was the sea. This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Ephraim according to their families,

16:9 Selanjutnya bagi bani Efraim ditentukan kota-kota terpisah di tengah-tengah milik pusaka bani Manasye, segala kota itu dengan desa-desanya.

16:9 Together with the cities that were set apart for the children of Ephraim in the midst of the inheritance of the children of Manasseh, all the cities with their villages.

16:10 aTetapi orang Kanaan yang diam di Gezer tidaklah dihalau mereka. Jadi orang Kanaan itu masih tetap tinggal di tengah-tengah suku Efraim sampai sekarang, tetapi menjadi bbudak rodi.

16:10 a Yet they did not dispossess the Canaanites who dwelt in Gezer, but the Canaanites dwell in the midst of Ephraim to this day and have become b forced labor.

 

 

YOSUA 17

JOSHUA 17

 

 

3. Tanah yang Menjadi Bagian Manasye, Putra Sulung Yusuf

3. The land allotted to Manasseh, the firstborn of Joseph

17:1-18

17:1-18

 

 

17:1 Bagian undian yang ditentukan bagi suku Manasye, sebab dialah aanak sulung Yusuf, ialah demikian: Kepada bMakhir, anak sulung Manasye, bapa Gilead, telah diberikan Gilead dan Basan, karena ia seorang tentara.

17:1 And this was the lot for the tribe of Manasseh, for he was Josephs a firstborn. To b Machir, the firstborn of Manasseh, the father of Gilead, Gilead and Bashan had been given, since he was a man of war.

17:2 Jadi bagian itulah yang ditentukan bagi anak-anak Manasye yang lain, menurut akaum-kaum mereka, yakni bagi bani Abiezer, bani Helek, bani Asriel, bani Sekhem, bani Hefer dan bani Semida; itulah keturunan yang laki-laki dari Manasye bin Yusuf, menurut kaum-kaum mereka.

17:2 Therefore the lot was for the rest of the children of Manasseh according to their a families: for the children of Abiezer and for the children of Helek and for the children of Asriel and for the children of Shechem and for the children of Hepher and for the children of Shemida; these were the male children of Manasseh the son of Joseph according to their families.

17:3 Tetapi aZelafehad bin Hefer bin Gilead bin Makhir bin Manasye tidak mempunyai anak laki-laki, tetapi hanya 1anak perempuan. Inilah nama anak-anaknya itu: Mahla, Noa, Hogla, Milka dan Tirza.

17:3 But a Zelophehad the son of Hepher, the son of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh, had no sons, but 1 daughters. And these are the names of his daughters: Mahlah and Noah, Hoglah, Milcah, and Tirzah.

17:4 Mereka datang menghadap imam aEleazar, dan menghadap Yosua bin Nun, serta para pemimpin, dan berkata: Tuhan telah memerintahkan kepada Musa untuk memberikan milik pusaka kepada kami di tengah-tengah saudara-saudara kami. Sebab itu diberikannya kepada mereka, bmilik pusaka di tengah-tengah saudara-saudara ayah mereka, sesuai dengan titah Tuhan.

17:4 And they came before a Eleazar the priest and before Joshua the son of Nun and before the leaders, saying, Jehovah commanded Moses to give us an b inheritance among our brothers. Therefore he gave them an inheritance among their fathers brothers according to the commandment of Jehovah.

17:5 Demikianlah kepada suku Manasye jatuh sepuluh bidang tanah, selain dari atanah Gilead dan Basan yang di seberang Yordan,

17:5 And ten portions fell to Manasseh, besides the a land of Gilead and Bashan, which is across the Jordan,

17:6 sebab anak-anak perempuan Manasye telah menerima milik pusaka di tengah-tengah anak-anaknya lelaki, sedang tanah Gilead ditentukan bagi anak-anak lelaki Manasye yang lain.

17:6 Because the daughters of Manasseh received an inheritance among his sons. And the land of Gilead belonged to the rest of the children of Manasseh.

17:7 aJadi batas daerah Manasye ialah dari Asyer ke Mikhmetat yang di sebelah timur Sikhem; kemudian batas itu terus ke selatan ke daerah penduduk En-Tapuah.

17:7 a And the border of Manasseh was from Asher to Michmethath, which was opposite Shechem; and the border went south to the inhabitants of En-tappuah.

17:8 Tanah Tapuah adalah kepunyaan suku Manasye, tetapi kota Tapuah, dekat batas daerah Manasye, adalah kepunyaan bani Efraim.

17:8 The land of Tappuah belonged to Manasseh, but Tappuah, on the border of Manasseh, belonged to the children of Ephraim.

17:9 Kemudian batas itu turun ke sungai Kana, ke sebelah selatan sungai itu. Kota-kota di sana adalah kepunyaan suku Efraim, sekalipun di tengah-tengah kota-kota suku Manasye. Selanjutnya batas daerah Manasye itu lewat dari sebelah utara sungai itu dan berakhir ke laut.

17:9 And the border went down to the brook of Kanah. These cities to the south of the brook belonged to Ephraim, among the cities of Manasseh; and the border of Manasseh was to the north of the brook, and its end was the sea.

17:10 Ke selatan daerah itu kepunyaan suku Efraim dan ke utara kepunyaan suku Manasye. Batasnya ialah laut; di sebelah utara batas daerah itu menyinggung daerah Asyer, di sebelah timur menyinggung daerah Isakhar.

17:10 To the south was Ephraims, and to the north was Manassehs, and the sea was his border. And they touched Asher on the north and Issachar on the east.

17:11 Tetapi di daerah Isakhar dan Asyer ada juga kepunyaan suku Manasye, yakni Bet-Sean dengan segala anak kotanya, Yibleam dengan segala anak kotanya, penduduk Dor dengan segala anak kotanya, penduduk En-Dor dengan segala anak kotanya, penduduk Taanakh dengan segala anak kotanya, dan penduduk Megido dengan segala anak kotanya, yakni ketiga daerah bukit itu.

17:11 And to Manasseh there belonged in Issachar and Asher, Beth-shean and its towns, and Ibleam and its towns, and the inhabitants of Dor and its towns, and the inhabitants of En-dor and its towns, and the inhabitants of Taanach and its towns, and the inhabitants of Megiddo and its towns (the third is Napheth).

17:12 aTetapi bani Manasye tidak dapat menduduki kota-kota itu, sebab orang Kanaan berhasil untuk tetap diam di negeri itu.

17:12 a Yet the children of Manasseh could not dispossess these cities, but the Canaanites persisted in dwelling in this land.

17:13 Setelah orang Israel menjadi kuat, orang Kanaan itu dibuatnya menjadi aorang rodi, tetapi tidaklah sama sekali mereka itu dihalaunya.

17:13 And when the children of Israel became strong, they made the Canaanites a forced labor; but they did not utterly dispossess them.

17:14 Berkatalah bani Yusuf kepada Yosua, demikian: Mengapa engkau memberikan kepadaku hanya satu abagian undian dan satu bidang tanah saja menjadi milik pusaka, padahal aku ini bangsa yang banyak jumlahnya, karena Tuhan sampai sekarang memberkati aku?

17:14 Then the children of Joseph spoke to Joshua, saying, Why have you given me an inheritance of only one lot and one a portion, although I am still a numerous people, whom Jehovah has thus far blessed?

17:15 Jawab Yosua kepada mereka: Kalau engkau bangsa yang banyak jumlahnya, pergilah ke hutan dan bukalah tanah bagimu di sana di negeri orang Feris dan orang Refaim, jika pegunungan Efraim terlalu sesak bagimu.

17:15 And Joshua said to them, If you are a numerous people, go up to the forest, and cut out land there for yourself in the land of the Perizzites and the Rephaim; since the hill country of Ephraim is too narrow for you.

17:16 Kemudian berkatalah bani Yusuf: Pegunungan itu tidak cukup bagi kami, dan semua orang Kanaan yang diam di dataran itu mempunyai akereta besi, baik yang diam di Bet-Sean dengan segala anak kotanya maupun yang diam di lembah Yizreel.

17:16 And the children of Joseph said, The hill country is not enough for us; and all the Canaanites who dwell in the land of the valley have a chariots of iron, both those of Beth-shean and its towns and those in the valley of Jezreel.

17:17 Lalu berkatalah Yosua kepada keturunan Yusuf, kepada suku Efraim dan suku Manasye: Engkau ini bangsa yang banyak jumlahnya dan mempunyai kekuatan yang besar; tidak hanya satu bagian undian ditentukan bagimu,

17:17 And Joshua spoke to the house of Joseph, to Ephraim and Manasseh, saying, You are a numerous people, and you have great strength; you shall not have one lot only,

17:18 tetapi pegunungan itu akan ditentukan bagimu juga, dan karena tanah itu hutan, haruslah kamu membukanya; kamu akan memilikinya sampai kepada ujung-ujungnya, sebab kamu akan menghalau orang Kanaan itu, sekalipun mereka mempunyai kereta besi dan sekalipun mereka kuat.

17:18 But the hill country shall be yours. Though it is a forest, you shall cut it down, and its end will be yours; for you shall dispossess the Canaanites, though they have chariots of iron and though they are strong.

 

 

YOSUA 18

JOSHUA 18

 

 

F. Tanah yang Menjadi Bagian Ketujuh Suku yang Lain

F. The land to be allotted to the rest of the seven tribes

18:1-19:51

18:1-19:51

1. Persiapan Yosua Mengundi dan Membagikan Tanah untuk Ketujuh Suku

1. Joshua's preparations for allotting and dividing the land unto the seven tribes

18:1-10

18:1-10

 

 

18:1 Maka berkumpullah segenap umat Israel di aSilo, lalu mereka menempatkan bKemah Pertemuan di sana, karena negeri itu telah takluk kepada mereka.

18:1 And the whole assembly of the children of Israel gathered together at a Shiloh, and they set up the b Tent of Meeting there; and the land was subdued before them.

18:2 Pada waktu itu masih tinggal tujuh suku di antara orang Israel, yang belum mendapat bagian milik pusaka.

18:2 And among the children of Israel there remained seven tribes whose inheritance had not been divided to them.

18:3 Sebab itu berkatalah Yosua kepada orang Israel: Berapa lama lagi kamu bermalas-malas, sehingga tidak pergi menduduki negeri yang telah diberikan kepadamu oleh Tuhan, Allah nenek moyangmu?

18:3 And Joshua said to the children of Israel, How long will you be slack about going to take possession of the land that Jehovah, the God of your fathers, has given you?

18:4 Ajukanlah tiga orang dari tiap-tiap suku; maka aku akan menyuruh mereka, supaya mereka bersiap untuk menjelajahi negeri itu, mencatat keadaannya, sekadar milik pusaka masing-masing, kemudian kembali kepadaku.

18:4 Appoint three men for each tribe, and I will send them out. And they shall rise up and go through the land, and write a description of it with a view to its being their inheritance; and they shall come to me.

18:5 Sesudah itu mereka akan membaginya di antara mereka menjadi tujuh bagian. Suku Yehuda akan tetap tinggal dalam daerahnya di sebelah selatan dan keturunan Yusuf akan tetap tinggal dalam daerahnya di sebelah utara.

18:5 And they shall divide it into seven portions: Judah shall stay at his border on the south, and the house of Joseph shall stay at their border on the north.

18:6 Kamu catat keadaan negeri itu dalam tujuh bagian dan kamu bawa ke mari kepadaku; lalu aku akan 1membuang undi di sini bagi kamu di hadapan Tuhan, Allah kita.

18:6 And you shall describe the land in seven portions and bring the description here to me, then I will 1 cast lots for you here before Jehovah our God.

 

 

18:7 Sebab aorang Lewi tidak mendapat bagian di tengah-tengah kamu, karena jabatan sebagai imam Tuhan ialah milik pusaka mereka, sedang bsuku Gad, suku Ruben dan suku Manasye yang setengah itu telah menerima milik pusaka di sebelah timur sungai Yordan, yang diberikan kepada mereka oleh Musa, hamba Tuhan.

18:7 But the a Levites shall have no portion among you, for the priesthood of Jehovah is their inheritance. And b Gad and Reuben and the half-tribe of Manasseh received their inheritance across the Jordan eastward, which Moses the servant of Jehovah had given to them.

18:8 Kemudian bersiaplah orang-orang itu, lalu pergi, sedang Yosua memerintahkan kepada mereka, pada waktu mereka berangkat, supaya mereka mencatat keadaan negeri itu, katanya: Pergilah, jelajahilah negeri itu, catatkanlah keadaannya, kemudian kembalilah kepadaku; maka di sini, di Silo, aku akan membuang undi bagi kamu di hadapan Tuhan.

18:8 And the men rose up and went; and Joshua commanded those who went to describe the land, saying, Go and walk through the land, and describe it; then return to me, and I will cast lots for you before Jehovah here in Shiloh.

18:9 Orang-orang itu pergi dan berjalan melalui negeri itu; mereka mencatat keadaannya dalam suatu daftar, kota demi kota, dalam tujuh bagian, lalu kembali kepada Yosua ke tempat perkemahan di Silo.

18:9 So the men went, and they passed through the land and described it by cities into seven portions in a book. Then they came to Joshua at the camp at Shiloh.

18:10 Lalu Yosua membuang aundi bagi mereka di Silo, di hadapan Tuhan, dan di sanalah Yosua membagikan negeri itu kepada orang Israel, sesuai dengan pembagian mereka.

18:10 And Joshua cast a lots for them in Shiloh before Jehovah. And there Joshua divided the land to the children of Israel according to their divisions.

 

 

2. Tanah yang Menjadi Bagian Suku Benyamin

2. The land allotted to the tribe of Benjamin

18:11-28

18:11-28

 

 

18:11 Maka keluarlah undian suku bani Benyamin menurut kaum-kaum mereka, dan daerah yang diundikan kepada mereka terdapat antara daerah bani Yehuda dan daerah bani Yusuf.

18:11 And the lot of the tribe of the children of Benjamin came out, according to their families. And the border of their lot went between the children of Judah and the children of Joseph.

18:12 aBatas pada sisi utara bagi mereka mulai dari sungai Yordan; kemudian batas itu naik ke lereng gunung di sebelah utara Yerikho, naik ke barat ke pegunungan, dan menuju ke padang gurun Bet-Awen.

18:12 a And their border on the northern side was from the Jordan, and the border went up alongside Jericho on the north, and went up through the hill country westward, and its end was at the wilderness of Beth-aven.

18:13 Dari sana batas itu terus ke Lus, ke selatan, ke arah lereng gunung dekat Lus, itulah aBetel; kemudian batas itu turun ke Atarot-Adar di pegunungan yang di sebelah selatan Bet-Horon Hilir.

18:13 And from there the border passed to Luz, on the southern side of Luz (this is a Bethel); and the border went down to Ataroth-addar, at the mountain which is south of Lower Beth-horon.

18:14 Kemudian batas itu melengkung, lalu membelok dari pegunungan yang di seberang Bet-Horon di sebelah selatan menuju ke sisi barat daya, dan berakhir di Kiryat-Baal, itulah Kiryat-Yearim, suatu kota bani Yehuda. Itulah sisi barat.

18:14 And the border turned from there and went around the west side southward, from the mountain that is to the south of Beth-horon; and its end was at Kiriath-baal (this is Kiriath-jearim), a city of the children of Judah. This was the west side.

18:15 aSisi selatan mulai dari ujung Kiryat-Yearim, kemudian batas itu menuju ke barat, dan menuju pula ke mata air Me-Neftoah.

18:15 a The south side was from the limit of Kiriath-jearim, and the border went from the west and went to the fountain of the waters of Nephtoah;

18:16 Selanjutnya batas itu turun ke ujung pegunungan yang di tentangan 1lebak Ben-Hinom, di sebelah utara lembah orang Refaim; kemudian turun ke alebak Hinom, sepanjang lereng gunung Yebus, ke selatan, kemudian turun ke En-Rogel.

18:16 And the border went down to the limit of the mountain that is before the 1 Valley of Ben-hinnom, which is north of the valley of the Rephaim; and it went down into the a Valley of Hinnom, to the southern side of the Jebusite slope, and went down to En-rogel,

18:17 Kemudian melengkung ke utara, menuju ke En-Semes dan menuju pula ke Gelilot di seberang pendakian Adumim, turun ke batu Bohan bin Ruben,

18:17 And turned north, and went to En-shemesh, and went to Geliloth, which is opposite the ascent of Adummim; and it went down to the stone of Bohan the son of Reuben;

18:18 terus ke lereng gunung di seberang Bet-Araba ke utara, dan turun ke Araba-Yordan.

18:18 And it passed by the side before the Arabah northward, and went down to the Arabah;

18:19 Kemudian batas itu terus ke lereng gunung dekat Bet-Hogla ke utara dan batas itu berakhir ke teluk utara Laut Asin, ke muara sungai Yordan di sebelah selatan. Itulah batas selatan.

18:19 And the border passed by the northern side of Beth-hoglah, and the end of the border was at the northern bay of the Salt Sea at the south end of the Jordan. This was the southern border.

18:20 Sungai Yordan ialah batasnya pada sisi timur. Itulah milik pusaka bani Benyamin dengan batas-batasnya ke segala penjuru menurut kaum-kaum mereka.

18:20 And the Jordan borders it on the east side. This was the inheritance of the children of Benjamin according to their families, according to its borders all around.

18:21 Kota-kota suku bani Benyamin menurut kaum-kaum mereka ialah aYerikho, Bet-Hogla, Emek-Kezis,

18:21 And the cities of the tribe of the children of Benjamin according to their families were a Jericho and Beth-hoglah and Emek-keziz

18:22 Bet-Araba, Zemaraim, aBetel,

18:22 And Beth-arabah and Zemaraim and a Bethel

18:23 Haawim, Para, Ofra,

18:23 And Avvim and Parah and Ophrah

18:24 Kefar-Haamonai, Ofni dan Geba; dua belas kota dengan desa-desanya.

18:24 And Chephar-ammoni and Ophni and Geba: twelve cities with their villages.

18:25 Gibeon, Rama, Beerot,

18:25 Gibeon and Ramah and Beeroth

18:26 Mizpa, Kefira, Moza,

18:26 And Mizpeh and Chephirah and Mozah

18:27 Rekem, Yirpeel, Tarala,

18:27 And Rekem and Irpeel and Taralah

18:28 Zela, Elef dan aYebus, ialah 1Yerusalem, Gibeat dan Kiryat; empat belas kota dengan desa-desanya. Itulah milik pusaka bani Benyamin menurut kaum-kaum mereka.

18:28 And Zelah, Haeleph, and that of the a Jebusite (this is 1 Jerusalem), Gibeath, Kiriath: fourteen cities with their villages. This was the inheritance of the children of Benjamin according to their families.

 

 

YOSUA 19

JOSHUA 19

 

 

3. Tanah yang Menjadi Bagian Suku Simeon

3. The land allotted to the tribe of Simeon

19:1-9

19:1-9

19:1 And the second lot came out for Simeon, for the tribe of the children of Simeon, according to their families. And their inheritance was in the a midst of the inheritance of the children of Judah.

19:2 aSebagai milik warisan mereka menerima: Bersyeba, Syeba, Molada,

19:2 a And they had for their inheritance Beer-sheba, or Sheba, and Moladah

19:3 Hazar-Sual, Bala, Ezem,

19:3 And Hazar-shual and Balah and Ezem

19:4 Eltolad, Betul, Horma,

19:4 And Eltolad and Bethul and Hormah

19:5 Ziklag, Bet-Hamarkabot, Hazar-Susa,

19:5 And Ziklag and Beth-marcaboth and Hazar-susah

19:6 Bet-Lebaot dan Saruhen: tiga belas kota dengan desa-desanya.

19:6 And Beth-lebaoth and Sharuhen: thirteen cities with their villages.

19:7 En-Rimon, Eter, dan Asan: empat kota dengan desa-desanya;

19:7 Ain, Rimmon, and Ether, and Ashan: four cities with their villages.

19:8 And all the villages which were around these cities as far as Baalath-beer, that is, Ramah of the Negev. This was the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Simeon according to their families.

19:9 Milik pusaka bani Simeon diambil dari bagian bani Yehuda. Karena bagian bani Yehuda itu terlalu besar bagi mereka, maka bani Simeon menerima milik pusaka di atengah-tengah mereka.

19:9 Out of the portion of the children of Judah was the inheritance of the children of Simeon because the portion of the children of Judah was too large for them; thus the children of Simeon received an inheritance in the a midst of their inheritance.

4. The land allotted to the tribe of Zebulun

19:10-16

19:10-16

19:11 Ke sebelah barat batas mereka itu naik ke Marala, menyinggung Dabeset, kemudian menyinggung sungai yang mengalir lewat Yokneam.

19:11 And their border went up to the west, even to Maralah, and reached Dabbesheth; and it reached the brook that is before Jokneam.

19:12 Dari Sarid batas itu berbalik ke timur, ke arah matahari terbit, melalui daerah Kislot-Tabor, menuju Dobrat, naik ke Yafia;

19:12 And it turned from Sarid eastward toward the rising of the sun to the border of Chisloth-tabor, and went to Daberath and up to Japhia;

19:13 dari sana terus ke timur, ke arah matahari terbit, ke Gat-Hefer, ke Et-Kazin, menuju ke Rimon, dan melengkung ke Nea.

19:13 And from there it passed eastward toward the rising of the sun to Gath-hepher, to Eth-kazin, and went to Rimmon, where it turned to Neah;

19:14 Kemudian batas itu membelok mengelilinginya di sebelah utara Hanaton, dan berakhir di lembah Yiftah-El.

19:14 And the border went around from the north to Hannathon; and its end was the valley of Iphtahel,

19:15 Lagi Katat, Nahalal, Simron, Yidala dan Betlehem; dua belas kota dengan desa-desanya.

19:15 With Kattath and Nahalal and Shimron and Idalah and Bethlehem: twelve cities with their villages.

19:16 Itulah milik pusaka bani Zebulon menurut kaum-kaum mereka; kota-kota tadi dengan desa-desanya.

19:16 This was the inheritance of the children of Zebulun according to their families, these cities with their villages.

19:22 And the border reached a Tabor and Shahazumah and Beth-shemesh; and the end of their border was at the Jordan: sixteen cities with their villages.

19:27 And it turned toward the rising of the sun to Beth-dagon, and reached Zebulun and the valley of Iphtahel northward to Beth-emek and Neiel, and went to Cabul on the north

19:28 dan ke Ebron, Rehob, Hamon dan Kana sampai ke aSidon Besar.

Mereka merebutnya, memarang penduduknya dengan mata pedang dan mendudukinya. Lalu menetaplah mereka di sana dan menamai Lesem itu Dan menurut nama Dan, bapa leluhur mereka.

19:47 When the territory of the a children of Dan was lost to them, the children of Dan went up and fought against 1 Leshem; and they took it and struck it with the edge of the sword; and they took possession of it and inhabited it; and they called Leshem Dan, according to the name of Dan their father.

19:49-51
